RTCRemoteOutboundRtpStreamStats.summary: The RTCRemoteOutboundRtpStreamStats dictionary of the WebRTC API is used to report statistics from remote endpoint of its outbound RTP stream, which corresponds to an inbound stream that is currently received by an object.

remarks.para: The statistics can be obtained by iterating the returned by until you find a report with the type of remote-outbound-rtp.
